content: a simple and classic shawl 1 which is transformed by the beautiful color combinations of sultan deluxe yarn from cotton kings keep it simple and let the colors transform your next shawl **materials ** cotton kings sultan deluxe hook size g/6 **measurements ** approx 72 83 x 28 34 **gauge ** 22 stitches x 9 row = 4 x 4 **usage ** approx 9 12 oz 1 ball of yarn **abbreviations ** **chain** chain **magic_ring** magic_ring **s** stitch **single_crochet** single_crochet **double_crochet** double_crochet **treble_crochet** triple crochet **chain-space** chain space 1 https //hobbii com/simple-lines-shawl utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=simple-lines-shawl+hbtrack&utm_term=swr
